body: How I create on, like how do I post it?
body_tagged: How I create on, like how do I post it?
title: Need help on staff app.

replies.body: When staff apps open, You have to make a topic in the Staff Application tab
replies.body_tagged: When staff apps open, You have to make a topic in the Staff Application tab

replies.body: Oh ok, thanks! And one more thing will interview be on the ts.
replies.body_tagged: Oh ok, thanks! And one more thing will interview be on the ts.

reply_to.body: When staff apps open, You have to make a topic in the Staff Application tab
reply_to.body_tagged: When staff apps open, You have to make a topic in the Staff Application tab

replies.body: Interviews will be held on TS.
replies.body_tagged: Interviews will be held on TS.

reply_to.body: Oh ok, thanks! And one more thing will interview be on the ts.
reply_to.body_tagged: Oh ok, thanks! And one more thing will interview be on the ts.

replies.body: Yes all interviews are done through team speak.
replies.body_tagged: Yes all interviews are done through team speak.

reply_to.body: Oh ok, thanks! And one more thing will interview be on the ts.
reply_to.body_tagged: Oh ok, thanks! And one more thing will interview be on the ts.

reply_to.body: Interviews will be held on TS.
reply_to.body_tagged: Interviews will be held on TS.

replies.body: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?
replies.body_tagged: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?

reply_to.body: Interviews will be held on TS.
reply_to.body_tagged: Interviews will be held on TS.

replies.body: Was just about to ask this.
replies.body_tagged: Was just about to ask this.

reply_to.body: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?
reply_to.body_tagged: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?

reply_to.body: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?
reply_to.body_tagged: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?

replies.body: From my understanding yes but Teamspeak is preferred. You will need to have and be active on Teamspeak anyway so I don't see why you wouldn't use it ^^
replies.body_tagged: From my understanding yes but Teamspeak is preferred. You will need to have and be active on Teamspeak anyway so I don't see why you wouldn't use it ^^

reply_to.body: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?
reply_to.body_tagged: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?

replies.body: We only give the interviewee an interview through Skype, if they are experiencing technical difficulties with Teamspeak.
replies.body_tagged: We only give the interviewee an interview through Skype, if they are experiencing technical difficulties with Teamspeak.

reply_to.body: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?
reply_to.body_tagged: Wasn't Skype also an interview option?

replies.body: Therefore it would be a technical issue with Teamspeak. If your microphone works with Skype, then we can figure something out :)
replies.body_tagged: Therefore it would be a technical issue with Teamspeak. If your microphone works with Skype, then we can figure something out :)

reply_to.body: What if my microphone doesn't work with TS? It's hooked up, but people can't hear me.
reply_to.body_tagged: What if my microphone doesn't work with TS? It's hooked up, but people can't hear me.

replies.body: When we make the app do we archive it?
replies.body_tagged: When we make the app do we archive it?

replies.body:
No, it will be locked.
If you are worrying about other players viewing your application, that will not be a problem, because it is private between yourself and the staff, just as player reports are.
replies.body_tagged:
No, it will be locked.
If you are worrying about other players viewing your application, that will not be a problem, because it is private between yourself and the staff, just as player reports are.

reply_to.body: When we make the app do we archive it?
reply_to.body_tagged: When we make the app do we archive it?

replies.body:
erm, no?

just create the application under the proper subtopic and you're good to go.
